Hi, 

I'm interested in modeling a 1 dimensional unstrained diffusion 
flame.  The code I would like to set up is very similar to the Flame1 
demo.  I would like to replace the 'outlet', which appears to only 
specify gradients, with something like the reservior, which specifies 
a fixed temperature and composition.  Cantera complains that reservoir 
is not a Domain1D object.  What object can I use instead?

Steve
